paragraphs.content: I am a psychiatrist who works with children, teenagers, adults and families struggling with relationship concerns, sexual identity, cultural identity, immigration stress as well as mood disorders and anxiety. Having received training in different psychotherapy modalities as well as pharmacotherapy, I strive to help people across the lifespan achieve their best selves. In my practice, I merge different psychotherapeutic approaches to provide an individualized treatment that best fits my patients and their families particularly when navigating cultural and racial identities. Throughout our work together, I use my training as a Child and Adolescent Psychiatrist to take into account the role of your culture and family of origin in informing your identity development through teenage years and well into adulthood.

The journey towards self actualization can be a difficult one. Take the first step of reaching out and I'll reach back to schedule a brief phone call for us to speak more and see if we are a good fit to work together.
